globalGuide.navigation.header: You are invited to try our newer version.
globalGuide.navigation.text2: Now you can search by Task Group
globalGuide.prefession.goonfree: Continue to use the Free Edition
globalGuide.profession.account.tip:
Pro subscription has expired, Pro functions and permissions in your personal projects will be suspended, to keep those , you need to renew your subscription or transfer affected projects into an organization

*Don't worry, if you continue with free version, your still have access to your projects and data.
globalGuide.profession.account.tip1: Teambition Pro is the newest version we developed for small scale teams. On top of all the features of the Free version, you can enjoy plentiful Applications and Extensions that match with professional authority management and realise unlimited collaboration. As a token of appreciation to our loyal users, you are entitled to use 6 months of Pro version for FREE.
globalGuide.profession.account.tip2:
Pro subscription has expired, Pro functions and permissions in your personal projects will be suspended, to keep those , you need to renew your subscription or transfer affected projects into an organization

*Don't worry, if you continue with free version, your still have access to your projects and data.

globalGuide.version.newyear.content6: You can check out the archived items much easier

globalGuide.version.newyear.title: First update this year
globalGuide.version.profession: You just got 6-months of Pro account!

guide.feature.filter.content: Now you can filter by Priority, Start Time or Custom Field
guide.feature.filter.title: Add more filters
guide.feature.gantt.content: The Gantt Chart links the Task and Time together in one chart. It presents the order and duration of each Task which enables you to manage Project progress. You can switch the view in the Project Menu.
guide.feature.gantt.title: Gantt Chart
guide.feature.international.content: All users who login outside of mainland China will be connected to the International Server by default in order to ensure a better experience. If you need to communicate with a user outside of mainland China,please tap your avatar to switch the server.
guide.feature.international.title: Teambition now has an International Server!
guide.feature.link.folder.content: You can link the Folder and receive Notifications for any activity of it
guide.feature.organization.template.cont: Project templet apply to all Members, which support advanced features. Create your exclusive Organization Templet now!
guide.feature.task.new.version.content: You can also add notes, comments and multilayer subtasks in it. Click the button on the right and see more details.
guide.feature.task.new.version.title: Brand New Subtask
guide.feature.tasks.custom.content: In the "Custom Priority View", you can drag/drop and sort tasks to arrange and manage your work better. Give it a try!
guide.feature.tasks.custom.title: Custom Priority View
guide.feature.tasks.custome.content: In "Custom Priority View", you can drag/drop and sort tasks to arrange and manage your work better. Give it a try!
guide.feature.tasks.custome.title: Custom Priority View
guide.point.activity.panel.note: Featured by catching Project progress, managing Members and categorizing up-to-date messages, the new Project Menu combines the previous Project Menu and Review together, which aims to simplify customer's experience!
guide.point.activity.panel.title: Here comes the brand-new Project Menu!
guide.point.event.appearin.note: Using Chrome or Firefox to join in audio, video or desktop-sharing sessions.
guide.point.event.appearin.title: appear.in video conferencing
guide.point.home.today.note: You can cooperate with others right here. For example, Eric has completed a Task; Jerry has created a new Meeting.
guide.point.home.today.title: Project Activities

guide.point.portal.homeCount.note:

You can change the way it shows up in the Project Settings.

guide.point.posts.more.note: Pin your most important Posts. Archive to hide your Posts.
guide.point.posts.more.title: Pin/Archive/Delete Posts
guide.point.tasks.group.note: Task Group help you organize different types of work in your Project. For example, a development team can manage their work by version.
guide.point.tasks.group.title: Create/Switch Task Groups
guide.sort.task.note:
Owners and Administrators can customize Task sorting order, which will be visible to all Members.
Members can select to view Task Panel by Priority, Start Time or Due Date created.

powerups.bookkeeping.des: Get it done. Bookkeeping helps financial managers get their entries registered fast and easy.

powerups.customFiled.des: Use Custom Field to show key information in Task, which can meet needs of more scenarios as well as help Members to view key points in Task easily.

powerups.disabled.in.template.tip: During the template creation process, payment Plug-ins are temporarily not supported. You can open them after you created the Project.
powerups.events.des: Keep everyone together with Meetings, using our built-in video conference tool.
powerups.events.short.des: Record every important event and have remote video conference at will.
powerups.evernote.des: Link your Evernote to your Tasks, Meetings and Posts,etc.

powerups.files.des: Files is your collaborative online disk. You can preview and upload images, documents, sheets, PDFs, etc.
powerups.github.des: Show up-to-date Pull Requests、Issues and Commits On Teambition.
powerups.github.short.des: Open and link GitHub, you can receive the relevant Notifications on Teambition.

powerups.markdown.des: Markdown is a simple format to manage your Notes, Tasks, Comments or Posts.

powerups.startDate.short.des: Set Start Time for Task to scientifically plan your work.
powerups.taskUniqueId.des: After activating, every time you create a Task, a serial number will be created. This will make communication and data transfer more convenient.

powerups.taskUniqueId.short.des: Creates a unique ID for every Task in a Project, making it easier to be located.
powerups.tasklist.des: Task Group can help you perform categorized management, especially for periodic developing or different periods of a marketing campaign.
powerups.tasklist.short.des: Activate Task Group to manage Tasks more organized.
powerups.tasks.des: Break down Project into Task and Subtask then set Due Date for them.You can also see the progress of others' Tasks in Task Panel.
powerups.tasks.short.des: Task helps to view Member's daily work intuitively.
powerups.timeView.des: Use Gantt Chart to make Tasks more intuitive.

powerups.weibo.des: Link Weibo content to your Tasks, Posts and Meetings.

powerups.works.des: File Library is equivalent to a collaborative network disk. It allows you to preview image, doc, PDF, xlsx, MP4,etc. It also allows you to update Files while retaining all previous versions.
powerups.works.short.des: File storage, supports different types of formats and online preview.
powerups.yinxiang.des: Link your Evernote to your Tasks, Posts, and Meetings.

powerups.yiqixie.des: Collaborative writing tool. Working on the same document with colleagues in Teambition, without redirecting to third-party services.

In Workflow mode, there will be the following changes:
  • • The final stage of the task will automatically be completed.
  • • Once the Task is completed, it will automatically flow to the final stage.
  • • Custom rules will no longer be valid for this Task Panel
